title: With Love
overview:
Hasegawa Takashi is a music composer who is going through bad times and 
doesn't believe in love. Murakami Amane is a bank employee and she 
always get scolded by her boss. They barely know each other, even though
 they work in the same building. One day, Takashi accidently e-mailed 
his works to Amane and they eventually get to know each other through 
the Internet, without revealing their true identities.
